==== Ubuntu Specific Activities at New Mexico GNU/LinuxFest ====
This is going to be your <nowiki>[[http://www.newmexicognulinuxfest.org|New Mexico GNU/LinuxFest]]</nowiki>, let us know the Ubuntu activities you would like to see. Should we learn how to package, learn the new features of Ubuntu 9.10? It's up to you so make a list and let's make the first <nowiki>[[http://www.newmexicognulinuxfest.org|New Mexico GNU/LinuxFest]]</nowiki> one of the best.

'''Details'''

* Date: December 19, 2009
* Time: 10:15am
* Location: New Mexico GNU/LinuxFest Expo Hall, other conference rooms

'''Activities'''
* Add your Ubuntu Activity to the list
* Ubuntu theater - A small section set apart in the Expo hall running Ubuntu tutorials thought out the day
